# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()  
{
	int t,arr[1000],n,p,count,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>p;
			arr[i]=p;
		}
		count=0;i=0;
		while(i<n){
			if(arr[i]>=i+1){
				arr[i]=arr[i]-(i+1);
				++count;
				continue;
			}
			i++;   
		}
		
		if(count & 1){
			cout<<"ALICE";
		}
		else{
			cout<<"BOB";
		}
		cout<<endl;
		
	}
return 0;
}
